cheatsheet.title: Creation of a Chart and Listing Report

intro.description: This tutorial helps you create a chart and listing report using BIRT.

item.title: Create a Data Source
item.description: In the Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sources and choose New Data Source.

item.title: Create a Data Set
item.description:
- In the Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sets and choose New Data Set.
- On New Data Set, Choose Next.
- On Query, in Available Items, expand one or more tables in the ClassicModels database.
- To create a SQL query, drag column names from Available Items to the right pane to write the SELECT and FROM clauses, then choose Finish.

item.title: Bind the data to the table
item.description:
- In the layout editor, right-click the Table tab and choose Edit Data Binding.
- On Data Binding, specify the data set to which the table binds.
- Drag the fields that you want in the table from the Data Set in the Data Explorer view to the table in the layout editor.

item.title: Edit the group
item.description:
- In the layout editor, select the Table tab, then right-click and choose Edit Group-NewTableGroup1.
- On Edit Group, specify the group details.

item.title: Edit the chart
item.description: In the layout editor, double-click the chart to edit its properties.
